name: Rustic Sourdough
description: Made with the sourdough starter passed down from generation to generation. Chewy, dense crumb on the inside, crusty on the outside. Enjoy with butter.

name: Flax & Pepitas
description: Crunchy with nutty notes. Get in your extra fibre in the most delicious way. Enjoy toasted for extra crunch. The ultimate base for avocado toast.

name: Jalepeno Cheddar
description: The bread that bites back. Feel the heat and melt into this cheesy combo.

name: Chocolate Cherry Hazelnut Loaf
description: Cozy up to this dense loaf with decadent chocolate chunks and the nutty crunch of toasted hazelnuts. Enjoy toasted with a pat of melted butter.

name: Lemon Crinkle Cookie
description: A soft chewy center zippy with lemon tang hides beneath the crackly, sugar dusted crust.

name: Blackbery Hand Pie
description: The pop tart of your dreams. This week's hand pie is bursting with blackberry preserves and drizzled with blackberry icing.

name: Blueberry Peach Gallette
description: Preserved peaches and blueberries from last summer's harvest will have you dreaming of a fragrant summer breeze.

name: Parm Spinach Spiral
description: Tender spinach is punctuated with sharp cheesy notes of parmigiano reggiano in this savoury pastry.

name: Flatbread
description: This Meditteranean-inspired flatbread is great for enrobing kabobs or complementing a mezze platter with hummus, labneh, and olives.

name: Choco Chip Cookie
description: The classic chocolate chip cookie. Warm. Gooey. Chocolatey. Need we say more?

name: Cinnamon Bun
description: Comfort food at it's finest. Warm your heart with this stick to your ribs bun full of gooey goodness.
